title: Reverse Function Not Working!?
text:
This app is great and has been a stepping stone for my viral videos on Tiktok. However, recently the reverse functions havent been working.

 When the reverse percentage was around 80% or 90%, it stops abruptly and says that it “couldn’t reverse the video”. It also takes way longer than usual to even get to 80% in the first place. For some, it stops and just turns the whole project into a black screen until you reopen the app again. And thats a pain in the behind especially when it didn’t save very recent changes beforehand.

I thought it wad just my slow Wi-fi, but after checking on Reddit, many others recently aren’t so lucky either. I updated the app hoping for an optimization on this, but no luck. I need it quick for a project I’m doing, and I would happily change my review to five stars once it gets fixed.

title: I love CapCut
text: CapCut is way fun. I use it all the time. It’s very simple to use coming from someone who’s never had access to video editing tools like these. I wish that you had access to everything without paying for Pro but that’s how they have to make their money since the app is free, so whatever and there’s not a ton of stuff that you don’t have access to.  Even without Pro there are no ads which is awesome because I’m sick of free apps having ads so that’s part of why I love it so much. Also having access to templates is really nice because it allows you to do things that maybe you hadn’t figured out how to do on your own. So it’s a great app and if you’re thinking about getting it it’s very worth your time (in my opinion).

title: It's nice and decent!

title: CapCut is great for beginners!
text: For beginners, it’s amazing! for an easy to use, fun editing app I definitely recommend!! it may not be the best but it’s great for starters and has so many fun filters, stickers, fonts, animations, flashes, and more! I’ve been using it for the past year now and love it! it has so many options for adding cool sounds, effects, stickers, emojis, filters, music, and much much more! you should definitely give it a try! Don’t use it though if you are wanting it to be  very professional, CapCut is great and all but to the point that your using it to make longer videos than about 5 minutes, it gets a bit hard. if you are not a beginner, maybe try another software that can handle more. CapCut is overall great for beginners though and I definitely recommend it for starters!

title: Good for editing
text:
I love this app, very good for adding text, coloring, shading, and watermarks. 

That is, if you know how to work it. 

There are many flaws in this app. 

The shakes, they aren’t really good. You need to add overlay after overlay after overlay… and it lags the more you add. It gets glitchy and will not process the video and show the progress. 

It would be nice to get actual transitions instead of sappy transitions that make the video awkward… And the shakes? Don’t get me started on those. 

They are horrible. Probably the biggest issue for me, and editor. You want a nice shake for a transition or to make the edit seem better and a little professional? CapCut isn’t exactly something you can depend on for that. 

You want to add panning? Make it seem just a bit more dramatic or feel like it needs movement? CapCut ain’t it. 

You wanna add a transition? Gotta add overlays and let it glitch. 

You want tiles? Oof, sounds like a you problem. 

You want a simple text animation? Maybe a glow, or just make the words come in one by one like in those good edits you see online? 

Go somewhere else, maybe some other app may have it cause CapCut sure doesn’t!

So many improvements needed. You’d expect a big editing app to be a little better.

title: Volume “apply to all”
text: CapCut is amazing. One of the best video editors (if you pay for the pro version) I’m never going back to splice, you can email splice and they don’t give two ****s about you. The only thing that CapCut can approve on (to me) is to have a button to changed the volume of all the clips together. For an 2 and half minute long video (with lots of cuts) can take up to an hour… an HOUR! To change all the volumes on all the clips. You have a sliding scale for volume that’s finicky. Want the volume up to 400? Be prepared to have it always go one 399…398… 403… 402. Then you get the volume to 400 and lift your finger and the slightest graze in any direction will change it. So you have to go back and try again and eventually get it to 400. Then time for the next 1.2 second clip. And repeat.

title: Overall pretty good editing app
text:
This app is very versatile and can even replicate effects from AE and AM pretty similarly if you do the right steps! I think its good for beginners to even more advanced editors with the same app!

Critques:
The few things to make this app even better would be for users to be able to favorites animations, saving colors, and image/video quality!

Favoriting animations, this is so the editing process goes a little faster, as if a transition you use is at the end of the list you have to scroll all the way and then select, whereas favoriting animation similar to favoriting effects would make that less of a hassle! (both text and clip animations)

Coloring, being able to save a custom made color would be a life saver as color picking can get annoying and tedious rather than just saving a custom palette!

Clip quality, I’ve notice that with all of the clips i’ve cropped in-app, the quality will go down drastically which is a problem. I am unsure if the app developers can fix this themselves but, every time i have to crop a clip, i always have to leave the app and crop the clip in my photos app. 

Overall good app, I believe fixing those few things will make the app even better!

userName: Idk but I need a name
title: Good but…
text: Overall this app is good for beginner editors! I love that everything is 100% free because I really don’t want to pay for a professional editing app. However, there’s only so much you can do with CapCut since everything consists of presets. It would be great if you could include options to make your own transitions, mask layers, animations, and import fonts. I also find it very frustrating that you can’t use combo and in/out animations at the same time for text and you can’t use animations on effects. The velocity/speed settings are also very glitchy and don’t create smooth videos. These are just a few suggestions that I really hope you take into consideration. Again, I do like this app but I’ll probably move on to a more complex software that gives me more creative freedom.

title: CapCut is the easiest choice for media creation
text: CapCut is unbelievably easy to pick up and learn. The vast majority of MES* (Media Editing Software) Programs are always encumbered by the following issue: Finding the proper balance between Designing a MES* program that is easy to use is… well.. easy! In sharp contrast to …Designing a MES* program that requires 75 of the most fruitless hours of learning, just to figure out how to implement a rudimentary transition. The individuals over at CapCut have created THAT which sits right in the center of those 2 extremes. In a sentence: CapCut as MES* is easy to learn & difficult to master; CapCut is like.. the emergent manifestation of smashing Chess & Checkers into one another in a particle accelerator. oh! and you can still make quality media with the free version.

title: Very good, some suggestions
text: My experience has been excellent with Capcut and it can make high-quality content, and you can tween with it. (A form of animation) two things I would like to suggest would be, 1. Using audio and content from files, and 2. Grouping overlays and audios. Files because you might already have an audio in files but not in photos or on the app’s saved audios from what you have used before. Grouping audio and overlay because maybe you want to animate a lot of pieces and need to copy that, or you might want to put more pieces, along with grouping audio because after I extract an audio then edit it, I will have to move that a long way to the desired part of the video I wanted to put it in.

title: An amazing app but a tiny issue.. + Recommendations.
text: I love this app, the editing, and everything! It’s so fun and easy to do. Again, I really appreciate this app but there is something I want to address, when I want to add a photo when I’m editing, it says I don’t have enough storage; I check my IPad Storage and my storage is completely fine. But, it’s probably because of my apple documents. Im not sure but it really annoys me, but overalls; This is a great app! Now that that’s out of the way, I kinda hope the app gets more effects! So what I’m recommending is more effects, and I want them to have smoother animations. The rest of the affects are good but I just hope there could be even smoother effects! Anyway, that’s all! Thanks for this app’s great effort!

title: Good buttttt
text: Okay so I've had CapCut for a little less than 2 months and I have had no problems until the other day. I'm a cosplayer and this has been the best app to edit all my videos and do transitions. (not allowed to have TikTok) I like to record my transitions at different times. Like let's say I'm going to make a transition where it's me out of cosplay and then me in cosplay, I would usually record me ooc a day or two before and then record the other part later on. When I click "continue recording" and press the record button it would start all over and the sound wouldn't play. But when you press finish/the check mark it shows the first part I recorded and then the second part. I apologize if this is confusing but I need this fixed. Please and thank you<33

title: I love capcut with here’s what is wrong!
text: so! it’s a good app an all, it’s easy to edit with, it’s fun to make templates, and I love the effects right? but it’s the storage, I’ll have really good storage like really good, i’ve deleted videos I’ve deleted photos and I’ve deleted a lot of things, same with some of my edits, and apps, but it’s annoying because capcut will say I don’t have enough storage, then i reset my device and it will sometimes work, second of all, I’ll have bad storage right? and i will press the “make an edit” button and it will say I don’t have good storage, which is fine because I know I don’t in this situation, but then later on in the day I don’t delete any videos or pictures or apps, and edits, and it will work. I love this app so much, pls try to fix these bugs🙂 thank you

title: Great editing app!
text:
CapCut is so far my favorite editing app. The layout and tools are simple and efficient, making this perfect for beginners/quick edits. But this doesn't make it low-quality. In fact, I've been using CapCut for 2 years now and have gotten great feedback from others. Another high is the CapCut watermark is out of the way, only showing up towards the end of the video. I would totally recommend CapCut to people with somewhat powerful devices. 

One minor problem is the app can get extremely laggy and slow. For example, if I moved an on-screen item I might have to wait a fat minute for it to actually move. This can get in the way of usage of keyframes. Other than this, CapCut is pretty great!

title: I love CapCut
text: All my friends have downloaded a app called CapCut. I didn’t know what it was and it seemed really cool because you can make these really great edits on TikTok! So, I downloaded it myself to try it out and to be honest at first I was so bad at it I thought I might just delete it. But my friend told me to not delete it and that it would get easier if I tried. I grew to love the app so much! I have so many more followers on TikTok and likes, sometimes I just like to make a edits in the car when I’m bored. I think it’s pretty good the way it is and a lot of people have been asking for different fonts, OK here’s my theory... YOU ONLY NEED ONE! Do you see if you post it on TikTok you can put different fonts on it there. Have a great rest of your day or night!❤️

title: Capcut is great 😊
text: Capcut is a great app I would definitely use it a lot to make it like when I’m scrolling on TikTok are used to see if I can edit it and I was like that would be too much work to make but when you actually download CapCut it’s just a template and you have to choose your photos. You don’t have to actually make all those edits that will take a long time. I’m really happy with Capcut now because I can make all the edits I want but if I wouldn’t have researched and heard that you only get to use template that’s great you can make your own template to, but I will take a long time but all these other edits I’ve been making and posting on my account it’s been really great. I never knew Capcut was so easy to use.

title: Amazing app but just one thing
text: It’s amazing overall, the effects, overlays and etc. I recommend using this app if your using mobile but just remember, it can be a little laggy if you put to much effects if it’s on apple. For me it’s amazing but sometimes when am bored and wanna make a edit I get my clips and I look for effects and I don’t have that much money to pay for pro but I just use it for edits that will later on be drafts, I don’t really export my capcut edits, so then when I search for it the pro effects are gone, like everyone that is pro, the text, effects, transition, everything that’s is pro isn’t there. I know the creator may not see this but if you do, please do something about it, because I really wanna use pro effects for my edits! Thank you!

title: A Good Free Editing App
text:
Frankly, Capcut’s a truly good editing app. There's room for lots of creativity and imagination, and it is good for beginner editors and others. I do have one or two complaints/advice.

-Capcut Pro. I do think adding Capcut Pro was a good way to make money/give people new effects, but I sort of preferred it when it was just free. Not many people buy Capcut Pro either way, it’s just there with extra flashy effects. Now I'm not saying you should remove it, I think Capcut Pro is a good way to get money, but it could have a more promotional way to get people to buy it.

-The Ability to do something. I will say the controls are easy to learn and easy to do, but something you can do on, let's use Alight Motion and Video Star (Pro as well) for an example, you can not do on Capcut. I wish you could, but you can’t. I know those apps like Alight Motion and VSP are supposed to be premium editing apps, but I wish you could do some stuff like that on Capcut. Also sliding into the topic of Capcut Pro, it's not one of those apps like Video Star where it is basically impossible to edit without the paid features, which I like about this app.

Overall, I enjoy this app. Keep up the great work Capcut!

title: Great but something needs to be fixed/added!
text: Ok. CapCut is SUCH AN AMAZING APP! The transitions.. dude, ITS UNIQUE! :D But.. please :( add more transitions, please??? I know there is a lot of transitions but add some more to (in) transitions and (out) transitions. The (out) transitions are kinda good but it needs more. Only in my opinion tho- also I don’t know but please add more and rework to voice affects. Plsssss? Some of the voices sound a little a like. And the chipmunk one sounds a little distorted because of a background noise? Idk if it’s the voice that’s being distorted. And the “distorted” voice doesn’t really sound distorted. It’s just a really low pitched voice- :< also add more voice changers, for example it’s distorted, kinda like and alien but it’s wavy voice, and add like bass booted, auto tune, and others :D would love that, anyways great app :)

title: Pretty good, but there are issues
text: I’m not one to go and write reviews though I feel like it is needed. I use this app all the time for my content creation. You can do quite a bit without having to pay, but these issues are getting a bit annoying. My main grievance is an issue with the filter templates. The “ai anime” filters are hit an miss. Most don’t work. They load to 67% then say it can’t process the images. Almost every template has started to do this. I think that it is just a massive bug instead of placing those filters behind a paywall without telling anyone. It would be great if you could fix that and give some wiggle room for creators to use more of the content without having to pay for the premium. Other than that, this is a pretty good app.

title: Great! One problem.
text:
The app is great. There are so many effects and fonts, everything was going great! UNTIL…i got roblox on my Chromebook. So lemme start of with the good. When I was on my phone everything was going good I don’t know if you realize but you guys have a lot of the roblox community use your app. It’s very good for roblox and was going great! 

Now, the bad.. So I downloaded CapCut since I had roblox on my Chromebook too. I went into the app to edit my clips, except nothing was there (except the photos that were there when I got it which was about 2 years ago) I even went in files because I had noticed the photos were in “downloads” so I put the files into “photos” and uninstalled then got it again. Nothing. Just nothing. The app is great just not on my Chromebook. Thanks capcut
